@hentailiker Looking forward for that since 2014 (Baku Ane) lol

Imagine if any of Takeda Hiromitsu's work were animated by Takashi Nishikawa. The one behind Baku Ane 1&2, Kagachi-sama, Otome Dori The Animation, Rance 01 The Animation, Sei Yariman Gakuen Enkou Nikki The Animation, and Shikkoku no Shaga The Animation. 

It would be a match made in heaven because Takashi's animation style would bring Takeda's art style to life as they're practically the same. They're made for each other. I want them to do a collab and do Sister Breeder as their first project. Baku Ane has imouto in it so it's already a cinch.

Is it me or the translation is taking way too much? I mean, for an anticipated NTR sequel, two weeks and still nothing is kinda surprising, although, the first part took 2 months so meh, I'´ll keep waiting patiently
